member.name: T:SharpGVGP.CryptoRandom
member.summary: This class provides generating more reliable random int and double values using the RNGCryptoServiceProvider class.

member.summary: The last generated random double value.

member.name: P:SharpGVGP.CryptoRandom.IntValue
member.summary: The last generated random int value.

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.CryptoRandom.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the CryptoRandom class, generating two initial random values for DoubleValue and IntValue.

member.name: T:SharpGVGP.Utils.MetricTypes
member.summary: Metrics provided by the DataProvider class.

member.name: T:SharpGVGP.Utils.DataProvider
member.summary: This class allows for threadsafe metric exchange between the agent and the UI.

member.name: F:SharpGVGP.Utils.DataProvider.Coverages
member.summary: Metric list available for exchange

member.name: F:SharpGVGP.Utils.DataProvider.Times
member.summary: Metric list available for exchange

member.name: F:SharpGVGP.Utils.DataProvider.Performances
member.summary: Metric list available for exchange

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Utils.DataProvider.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of the DataProvider class, with its queues empty and ready to use.

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Utils.DataProvider.ResetData
member.summary: Empties all metric queues available.

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Utils.DataProvider.AddCoverage(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Adds a coverage value to the Coverages queue.
member.param: Coverage value to be added to the queue.
Time value to be added to the queue.
member.returns: Returns an indicator of the success of the operation

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Utils.DataProvider.AddPerformance(System.Double)
member.summary: Adds a performance value to the Performances queue.
member.param: Value to be added to the queue.
member.returns: Returns an indicator of the success of the operation

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Utils.DataProvider.GetCoverages
member.summary: Dequeues all the elements stored on the Coverages and Times queues as a List of pairs [Coverage, Time].
member.returns: List of previously stored coverage and times values

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Utils.DataProvider.GetPerformances
member.summary: Dequeues all the elements stored on the Performances queue as a List.
member.returns: List of previously stored performance values

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Utils.DataProvider.EmptyQueue(SharpGVGP.Utils.MetricTypes)
member.summary: Dequeues the contents to the desired metric queue as a List.
member.param: Metric to be extracted
member.returns: List of previously stored metric values

member.name: T:SharpGVGP.Utils.VisionManager

member.name: T:SharpGVGP.NeuralNetwork
member.summary: This class allows the building of a Neural Network with a general topology.

member.name: T:SharpGVGP.NeuralNetwork.NeuronType
member.summary: Types of Neurons available for the Network.

member.name: F:SharpGVGP.NeuralNetwork.NeuronType.Input
member.summary: Input neuron. It only admits one input and comes from the medium.

member.name: F:SharpGVGP.NeuralNetwork.NeuronType.Output
member.summary: Output neurons. They provide the output of the system.

member.name: F:SharpGVGP.NeuralNetwork.NeuronType.Hidden
member.summary: Hidden neurons. They may have several inputs but only one output.

member.name: F:SharpGVGP.NeuralNetwork.Neurons
member.summary: Neuron units of the Network.

member.name: F:SharpGVGP.NeuralNetwork.Inputs
member.summary: Subset of Neurons which are inputs for the Network

member.name: F:SharpGVGP.NeuralNetwork.Outputs
member.summary: Subset of Neurons which are outputs for the Network.

member.name: F:SharpGVGP.NeuralNetwork.Biases
member.summary: Subset of Neurons which are biases in the network

member.name: P:SharpGVGP.NeuralNetwork.ConnectionCount
member.summary: Total number of connections on the Network.

member.name: P:SharpGVGP.NeuralNetwork.NeuronCount
member.summary: Total number of neurons of the Network.

member.name: P:SharpGVGP.NeuralNetwork.IsValid
member.summary: Indicates if the Network was built correctly and all of the Neurons can calculate an output.

member.summary: Get an instance of a Neural Network with custom parameters.
member.param: Number of connections
Number of neurons
Array with all of the connections
Array with all of the neuron types

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.NeuralNetwork.#ctor(System.UInt64,System.UInt64,SharpGVGP.NeuralNetwork.Connection[],SharpGVGP.NeuralNetwork.NeuronType[],SharpGVGP.NeuralNetwork.ActivationFunction)
member.summary: Get an instance of a Neural Network with custom parameters.
member.param: Number of connections
Number of neurons
Array with all of the connections
Array with all of the neuron types
Activation function of the Neural Network

member.summary: Checks if an input connection of the neuron is valid.

member.summary: Simulate the desired combination of key presses.

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Player.ReleaseAll
member.summary: Release all the Available Keys.

member.summary: Rectify the char to Keys conversion
member.param: char for conversion
member.returns: The Virtual Key code of ch

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Player.VkKeyScan(System.Char)
member.summary: Allows conversion from char to Virtual Key

member.returns: Virtual Key associated to ch

member.summary: Allows for input sending to other applications

Set to 0
Hold or release
Set to 0

member.name: T:SharpGVGP.SystemBlock`2
member.summary: This class allows for construction of the blocks of the agent's system. To use an instance of this class, the Start() method must be called. To get and input data, the In and Out methods must be used.

member.name: T:SharpGVGP.SystemBlock`2.ProcessInput
member.summary: Process to do with the inputs
member.param: Value of the input signal
member.returns: Returns a TOutput value.

member.name: F:SharpGVGP.SystemBlock`2.InputBuffer
member.summary: Primary input buffer of the block

member.name: F:SharpGVGP.SystemBlock`2.OutputBuffer
member.summary: Primary output buffer of the block

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.SystemBlock`2.#ctor(SharpGVGP.SystemBlock{`0,`1}.ProcessInput)
member.summary: Get an instance of SystemBlock
member.param: Delegate of the process to execute for the inputs

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.SystemBlock`2.#ctor
member.summary: Get an instance of SystemBlock

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.SystemBlock`2.SetProcess(SharpGVGP.SystemBlock{`0,`1}.ProcessInput)
member.summary: Set the process to be made to the input.
member.param: Process to do with the input

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.SystemBlock`2.In(`0)
member.summary: Insert a new value to the input buffer.
member.param: TInput value to insert in the queue.

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.SystemBlock`2.Out(`1@)
member.summary: Get the last output of the block.
member.param: Last TOutput value calculated.

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.SystemBlock`2.PeekOut(`1@)
member.summary: Peeks the last output of the block. Doesn't dequeue it.
member.param: Last value on the output queue.
member.returns: Result state of the operation.

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.SystemBlock`2.ObjectTask
member.summary: Task executed by the block every cycle.

member.name: T:SharpGVGP.Threader
member.summary: This class stipulates the methods necessary for using classes which perform threading tasks during gameplay as the namespace may manage them.

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Threader.#ctor
member.summary: Gets an instance of Threader

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Threader.Start
member.summary: Begins execution of the thread.
member.returns: Status of the operation

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Threader.Stop
member.summary: Stops execution of the thread.
member.returns: Status of the operation

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Threader.TogglePause
member.summary: Toggles the pause of the execution of the object's thread after finishing the current loop.
member.returns: Returns the status of the operation.

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Threader.SetStep
member.summary: Allow a single execution cycle for the thread.
member.returns: Returns the status of the operation.

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Threader.ObjectTask
member.summary: The threading task the object has to do. Must be implemented by the user. DO NOT USE while(true) ON THE IMPLEMENTATION

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Threader.PausableThread
member.summary: Execute the object task as long as the thread hasn't been paused.

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Threader.PauseStatus(System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Get the current status of the pause flag.
member.param: Variable where the current status of the pause flag will be returned.
member.returns: Success state of the operation

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Threader.PendingSteps(System.Int32@)
member.summary: Get the steps required before pausing again.
member.param: Variable where the step count will be returned.
member.returns: Success state of the operation

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Threader.SetPause(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the pause flag to the desired value.
member.param: New pause flag value.
member.returns: Success state of the operation.

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.Threader.Finalize
member.summary: Disposes safely of any instance of Threader

member.name: T:SharpGVGP.TwoInputsBlock`3
member.summary: Allows for two inputs on the same single output System block. It is important to know that this implementation doesn't Dequeue the elements on the input buffer. The declared ProcessInput must be able to distinguish if the received input is still the same of a new one, or to not fail when any of the inputs doesnÂ´t change.

member.name: T:SharpGVGP.TwoInputsBlock`3.ProcessInput
member.summary: Process to do with the inputs
member.param: Primary input of the block
Secondary input of the block
member.returns: Returns a TOut value.

member.summary: Get an instance of TwoInputsBlock.
member.param: Process to do with the inputs

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.TwoInputsBlock`3.SetProcess(SharpGVGP.TwoInputsBlock{`0,`1,`2}.ProcessInput)
member.summary: Process made to the input signals.

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.TwoInputsBlock`3.#ctor
member.summary: Gets an instance of a two input SystemBlock. Must call SetProcess before using Start.

member.name: M:SharpGVGP.TwoInputsBlock`3.In2(`1)
member.summary: Insert a new value to the secondary input buffer.
member.param: TInput value to insert in the queue.

member.summary: Task executed by the block every cycle.
